verses.verse: <S%G3588>This<s%> is a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>saying:<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3713>seeks<s%> the office of an <S%G1984>overseer,<s%> he <S%G1937>desires<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>work.<s%>

The <S%G1985>overseer<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> without <S%G423>reproach,<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G3524>temperate,<s%> <S%G4998>sensible,<s%> <S%G2887>modest,<s%> <S%G5382>hospitable,<s%> good at <S%G1317>teaching;<s%>

<S%G1161>(but<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G1492>how<s%> to <S%G4291>rule<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> will he take <S%G1959>care<s%> of the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%>)
<S%G3361>not<s%> a <S%G3504>new<s%> <S%G3361>convert,<s%> lest being <S%G5187>puffed<s%> up he <S%G1706>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the same <S%G2917>condemnation<s%> as the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

<S%G1161>Moreover<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> those who are <S%G1855>outside,<s%> to <S%G3361>avoid<s%> <S%G1706>falling<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3680>reproach<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3803>snare<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

<S%G1249>Servants,<s%> in the <S%G5615>same<s%> <S%G4586>way,<s%> must be reverent, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1351>double-tongued,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> addicted <S%G4337>to<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3631>wine,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> greedy for <S%G146>money;<s%>

Their <S%G1135>wives<s%> in the same <S%G5615>way<s%> must be <S%G4586>reverent,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1228>slanderers,<s%> <S%G3524>temperate,<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> those who have <S%G1247>served<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> <S%G4046>gain<s%> for <S%G1438>themselves<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G898>standing,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3954>boldness<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I wait <S%G1019>long,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> men <S%G1163>ought<s%> to behave <S%G390>themselves<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G4769>pillar<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1477>ground<s%> of the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Without <S%G3672>controversy,<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G2150>godliness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3173>great:<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G5319>revealed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G3700>seen<s%> by <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>nations,<s%> believed <S%G4100>on<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and received <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1391>glory.<s%>
